description: This data includes the number of toursists and tourist spending for the New Orleans Metro on annual basis from 2006 to present. Note: gambling spending was not included in tourist spending before 2012.

metadata.attribution: University of New Orleans Metropolitan Report

name: Tourists And Tourist Spending (2006 - Present)
